title: Heroic Charge in the Inferno
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, ultra-detailed, 16:9 aspect ratio, a full-body shot of a determined firefighter wearing reflective bunker gear and helmet, walking straight ahead, gripping a fire hose nozzle. The background is engulfed in a catastrophic structure fire, intense orange and yellow flames, and thick gray smoke billowing around him. Dynamic low-angle perspective, strong black outlines, high contrast shading, vibrant colors, classic Comic Book style, (action comic sound effects included: CRACKLE, WHOOSH).
